price: क्या वे ऊँटों को नहीं देखते कि वे कैसे पैदा किए गए हैं?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
